paras.para: Nope I'm not talking about Javascript 😋! I joined Bubby Lewis' patreon last month (Bubby's Dojo) and it has improved my mood on my bass journey. I've started dabbling in soloing and trying to get my voice 🗣️ on the bass.

I also am starting to learn my modes, I was really liking lydian and made a little jam that to me sounded a little like it belonged in Mario 👸! I put that on my public Insta. I restarted my SBL technique course.
I am starting to link up theory options under my bass theory and my intention was to learn as I code it which I think seems to be what's happening so that's a win.
My two fav pedals this month are definitely the discumbobulator and space echo 🪐. I must add these to my gear section. Maybe I have become a bit effect heavy lately, it's a lot of fun. 😜
